Header: No minority parties - Bodhu Bala Sena states
Content: The Bodhu Bala Sena Organisation states that the need for a main stream political party which represents the national ideology of the country is required instead of the minority parties in the country. Secretary of the Bodhu Bala Sena organisation Venerable Galagoda Aththe Gnanasara Thero expressed the following views to our news team. Against this backdrop Propaganda Secretary of the Front Line Socialist Party Pubudu Jayagoda stated that what was required was a political movement which was divisionally in unison. Media Spokesperson of the National Freedom front M. Mussamil meanwhile expressed the following views in this regard. However Leader of the Nava Sama Samaja Party Dr. Wickremabahu Karunarathna made the following observations when contacted.
